modShortDescription: This mod adds a military APC that can protect you from incoming damage and also fire missiles.
modDescription:
This mod adds a military APC that can protect you from incoming damage and also fire missiles.

The military APC can be unlocked by grease monkey level 5 or by schematics. Missiles can be fired from the mounted turret by pressing the right mouse button, the fire button can be configured in the controls settings under the [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) section. You must have the APC missile ammo in your inventory to be able to fire from the turret. The turret can be enabled and disabled by pressing left CTRL and the number 1 key at the same time, this can also be configured in the settings.

## Features

* Working turret
* Larger storage
* High durability
* Can be dyed
* 2 seats

Special thanks to Closer\_Ex for the vehicle weapon system and Laydor for his Quartz UI mod.

**Note:** This mod needs to be installed on both client and server for multiplayer. This mod is for A20 ONLY. **EAC MUST BE OFF!**

## Changelog

**Version 1.2**

Fixed an issue with NREs on multiplayer

**Version 1.1**

Fixed issues with compatibility between the [Apache Helicopter](https://7daystodiemods.com/ah-64-apache-helicopter/) and APC

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/Zilox/A20Modlets/-/archive/main/A20Modlets-main.zip?path=APC%20Mods/Mods)**
